title: Arc Length Formula
text: Use the formula for arc length in radians: arc $$length=r \theta$$. So $$\theta=\frac{20\pi}{30}=\frac{2}{3} \pi$$
speech: Use the formula for arc length in radians: arc  length is equal to, r theta, . So  theta is equal to, fraction, 20 pi, over 30,  is equal to 2 thirds pi
